sub_title: English translator, native speaker, specialising in legal and business translations
summary:
25+ years' experience providing business and legal translations in an international business environment.
Able to produce translations, edit and proof-read texts in a variety of styles, working to a consistently high standard whilst under pressure.
Specialisations include real estate, employment law, corporate governance, PR and marketing communications.
Service-minded attitude, committed to providing quality on time.
